languages.english-overview:
Monsta FTP Open source PHP/Ajax cloudware that puts FTP file management right in your browser, anywhere, any time.
Drag & drop files into your browser and watch them upload, like magic!
Monsta FTP is released under the GNU General Public License.

ul.li: Written for programmers of all levels
Compact install of just 2 files (+ assets)
Supports FTP on Linux and Windows
Drag and drop files to upload and move
